overview:
Guy Havenstein comes from both a technical and business background, providing a valuable bridge between the two disparate worlds.

Guy holds a Bachelor of Computer Systems Engineering from the University of Technology, Sydney (UTS). In addition to this, Guy has a Bachelor of Business in Accounting from UTS.

Guy worked as a Systems Administrator for Sun Microsystems Incorporated, a large multinational computer services and systems manufacturer.

Guy worked as a Presales Systems Engineer role in Sydney, Australia for Sun Microsystems.

Guy has also worked for an accounting firm as a business advisor and bookkeeper for small to medium sized business in the Sydney metropolitan area.

Guy has also run numerous businesses across the Information Technology and Communications field, including several small online ventures and a computer consulting company. The online ventures include an online store for electronic accessories as well as a Web 2.0 style invitation system.
